displayName.german: Eine Stadt, die zu Asche wurde

description.french: Terminez ''Le plus grand royaume de la Terre du Milieu''

description.danish: Gennemfør Det mest fantastiske kongerige i Midgård.

displayName.english: In a hole in the ground...

displayName.english: Slunk back from whence he came

displayName.dutch: Terug naar waar hij vandaan kwam
... steen is wat de klok slaat!

displayName.portuguese: Mais que um abridor de cartas!

description.spanish: Completa ''Sobre la colina y bajo la colina''

displayName.english: I believe the worst is behind us

description.english: Use every Dwarf from Thorin's Company in a Buddy-Up attack
